snippet: Josh Childress agreed to terms with the Nets on Tuesday and will be the favorite to win the backup job at small forward when training camp opens next month.
abstract: Josh Childress agrees to terms with the Brooklyn Nets and will be the favorite to win the backup job at small forward when training camp opens in October.
lead_paragraph: Josh Childress agreed to terms with the Nets on Tuesday and will be the favorite to win the backup job at small forward when training camp opens next month.

headline.seo: Josh Childress Set to Sign with Nets
headline.main: Childress Set to Sign with Nets
